name: The Death Pit Will Have You!
name_original: The Death Pit Will Have You!
description:
You, a lost mortal soul, have been summoned by the gods.

We seek your compliance, and offer you a moment's distraction in return. Then, you will return to your fall.

The task we have for you is simple: The floor below you is disappearing, one section at a time. Replace lost sections to survive as long as possible. Inevitably, though, THE DEATH PIT WILL HAVE YOU!

Input:

Keyboard WASD to Move

Mouse Left Click to Place Floor
